phrases: I am Gouda Takeo, a first-year in high school.
The trees and bugs are all doing great.
Takeo-kun, you look like a prince.
I will stay with you today, no matter what happens.
Oh, I told you it is all good.
Yamato and I are having a picnic, as a do-over of her birthday.
Yamato, looks like your backpack's too heavy.
Uh, like bento boxes and a water bottle and stuff.
This is all from bento boxes?
Well, there are snacks, hand towels,
It must have been tough to carry.
I wonder if I made too much.
I wonder if you can finish everything, Takeo-kun.
That pin looks great on you.
I have to say, it is a really nice day.
Do you want to take a small break?
I am stronger than I look.
Is not this more of a hike than a picnic?
Did not ask Sunakawa this time
I might have made a mistake.
I was having so much fun, I started humming without realizing it.
I bet bentos taste great at the top of a mountain!
It gets hot when you walk...
But I do not think we can get back up there by ourselves.
Takeo-kun, we do not have a signal...
Missing After Going on a Picnic
She is on a picnic with Takeo-kun.
It is nice to have a boyfriend.
How long have they been dating?
Sunakawa-kun was hot, but I bet he is not an option.
We could barely talk to him.
Rinko's boyfriend is not bad, either.
He is, like, not hot, but...
Seems Rinko thinks he is hotter than Sunakawa-kun, though.
Honey, where did Takeo run off to?
Now that you mention it, I have not seen him.
Hey, you are in the way.
I am sure he will come home soon.
There are not any signs of anyone having passed through here.
I will try looking around from above.
If I would grabbed on to a tree or something,
But no use crying over spilled milk.
Right now, what I should do
is to get Yamato home safe and sound.
I could hear cars in the distance.
There is a road over there.
Reaching the city might take till tomorrow.
We would have to spend the whole night by ourselves...
First, we have to head south.
You do not have to rush.
Let us just make progress while the sun's still up.
If you want, you can hang on to my shirt.
Takeo-kun, do you want to eat the bentos?
Eat as much as you want.
I am not that good at normal cooking.
Let us leave half for the night.
Let us keep going until night falls.
I want to put her at ease.
We cannot really see where we are going anymore...
We will have to camp here for the night.
Takeo-kun and me, just the two of us...
I will be right by your side.
I will not let them bite Yamato!
Yamato, is your cell still not getting a signal?
And if you set your screen to that, you will find a boyfriend.
Oh, you want to know if she is with us?
Not Back From a Date = Overnight Stay
We have other friends with us, too.
You want to talk to her now?
Um, but she is taking a bath.
Yes, we are all going to stay over.
Telling her we gave her an alibi...
You are being redirected to voicemail.
I cannot get through to her cell!
I appreciate your calling me during the weekend.
I have got nothing going on tomorrow
Hey, do you know where Rinko and her boyfriend went after their picnic?
I will make him eat it for breakfast.
I will put plastic wrap on it.
At night, it is pitch dark in the mountains.
Do not worry, it was just a boar.
I will fight off anything, even a bear.
Yamato will not be as worried anymore.
You must be tired from walking all day.
We are lying next to each other!
You can see a lot because it is really dark.
It is like being at the planetarium.
You always ask if I am all right,
I would not mind if we had to stay out here for the rest of our lives.
You are all worn out because of me.
And here I am with my head in the clouds.
I like you a lot, Takeo-kun.
Look at all the critters around you.
When you are around Takeo-kun, you feel safer.
I could not protect her from everything!
Oh, you have got a lot of bites!
I have always been popular with mosquitoes.
Well, I guess I managed to attract one,
so I saved you from one bite, at least.
I have a text from Nanako.
I smoothed things over with your fam.
Make sure you come over tomorrow and tell us everything.
We will all be here waiting.
Guess I will go to Nanako's place.
Okay, tell her hi for me.
Since we have spent so much time together,
leaving you feels kind of lonely.
Yamato, I feel the same way.
Oh, I could not get what you told me yesterday out of my mind.
Did something happen between Takeo and Rinko-chan?
We even pulled an all-nighter waiting for her!
Yeah, I was so nervous, I thought my heart would burst...
It was my first time, too.
We were outside the whole time.
But Takeo-kun made me feel safe.
Wait, you are all muddy, Rinko.
We kind of got lost in the mountains.
Good, I am glad to hear that.
I am glad we got back safely.
You had to work really hard.
I am sorry my head was in the clouds.
I was excited and nervous that I got to spend a lot of time with you,
I cannot express my feelings for Yamato in words.
What kind of feelings would they be?
Takeo, I do not think emoticons will help you there.
Received Message From: Takeo-kun To: Yamato Rinko Subject: RE: Glad We are OK Me, too.
I love you so much, Yamato.
